cufy.text

Interface Format

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Classifier, Formatter, Parser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFormat, JSON

    public interface Format
extends Formatter, Parser, Classifier
    A class that is a Formatter and Parser and Classifier at the same time.
    Since:
    15-Nov-2019
    Version:
    0.1.3
    Author:
    lsafer

    • Method Detail

      • cparse

        default <T> T cparse(java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Parse the given text to an object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the returned object
        Parameters:
        text - to be parsed
        Returns:
        an object parsed from the given text
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given 'text' is null
        ClassifyException - when any classification exception occurs
        ParseException - when any parsing exception occurs

      • cparse

        default <T> T cparse(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                     T object)
        Parse the given text to the given object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the parsed object
        Parameters:
        text - to be parsed
        object - the object to parse to
        Returns:
        the parsed object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given 'text' is null
        ClassifyException - when any classification exception occurs
        ParseException - when any parsing exception occurs

      • cparse

        default <T> T cparse(java.io.Reader reader)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Classify then parse the text read from the 'reader' to an object with the type of the 'outputClazz' and then return it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the parsed object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader to read from
        Returns:
        the parsed object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given 'reader' is null
        java.io.IOException - if any I/O exception occurs
        ParseException - if any parsing exception occurs

      • cparse

        default <T> T cparse(java.io.Reader reader,
                     T object)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Classify then parse the text read from the 'reader' to the given object and then return it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the parsed object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader to read from
        object - the object to parse to
        Returns:
        the parsed object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given 'reader' is null
        java.io.IOException - if any I/O exception occurs
        ParseException - if any parsing exception occurs
